cleaned_text: Crystal Meditation - Aquamarine Expand into higher frequencies with crystal energy! Enjoy a high frequency meditation led by Certified Crystal Healer and Mentor, Sarah Belle and experience how you can work with the quantum realm to raise your consciousness. In this guided meditation, you'll receive soul-expanding activations from aquamarine and expand your light quotient to feel restored, balanced, and higher than ever. In meditation, we relax the body and mind and make time for our soul to expand and connect with Source. This allows us to presence our I AM nature to hear the quiet aspects of our higher self that is always guiding us. This frequency upgrade incorporates the wisdom and beneficial energies citrine and solfeggio frequencies that promote restoration and balance of the body, mind, and spirit. Every meditation is channeled from the mineral kingdom to provide deep energetic healing, expand your soul, trigger dormant DNA to awaken and set you on a higher timeline of soul attunement. Upon purchasing this meditation, you'll receive a downloadable PDF document that contains the meditation link. We invite you to share you crystal meditation experience over in the [Anchor the Light Facebook Community!](https://www.facebook.com/groups/401714730551681) Physical Products only ships within the US. All items will be shipped via USPS and are carefully packed to ensure they arrive safely. Orders over $50 ship free. Digital Products & Programs confimation will be sent to your inbox with details information after checkout. Start Your Monthly Practice Anchor the Light Society Anchor the Light Society is a monthly membership that includes the Anchor the Light Ritual Kit and Practice to offer accountability to your spiritual journey and sacred self-care. Each month you'll be guided to go within, upgrade your beliefs and raise your vibration.
